briefdescription.para: Advanced ESP32 implementation of the unified BaseWifi class with ESP-IDF v5.5+ features.

detaileddescription.para: This file provides concrete implementations of the unified BaseWifi class for ESP32 microcontrollers with support for both basic and advanced WiFi features. It supports ESP-IDF v5.5+ APIs, advanced power management, WPA3 security, mesh networking capabilities, and enterprise-grade security features. The implementation includes comprehensive event handling, connection management, and performance optimizations specific to ESP32 hardware.

simplesect.para: Requires ESP-IDF v5.5 or higher for full feature support
